oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kenneth D. McKellar in Washington, D.C., to C.P. Simonton in Covington, TN
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McKellar, Kenneth D., 1869-1957

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tennessee Senator McKeller writes to Simonton of his displeasure at having to vote to allow eighteen year olds into the draft.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Letters.
Mckellar, Kenneth Douglas, 1869-1957.
Government and Politics.
